name: The Great Emu War Of 1932
description:
In 1932 the emu population has exploded. Food shortages and drought has lead many of the emu towards populated areas in search of food and water. You play as Bruce a soldier in the Australian army who has been dispatched with a squad of Australian troops to cull the escalating emu numbers.

The Great Emu War of 1932 is a single player game and features a 7 mission campaign with a horde mode.
